amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to require the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to carry out flood and storm damage reduction studies expeditiously in order to reduce the risk of damage from future floods and hurricanes in the Houston and Coastal Texas areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Culberson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
